 Locks nodes pPred and pCur.

Detailed Description

template<typename KEY, typename VALUE, typename PAIR_TRAITS, typename TRAITS, class ALLOCATOR>
struct cds::ordered_list::LazyList< gc::no_gc, KEY, VALUE, PAIR_TRAITS, TRAITS, ALLOCATOR >::Position

Position pointer for item search.

New node must be inserted between pPred and pCur

Condition: pPred != NULL and pCur != NULL because the list contains dummy nodes m_Head and m_Tail
